meta.title: Tinkernet
meta.description: Tinkernet is a validator for Polkadot and Kusama. We are a team of 5 people with a strong background in software development and blockchain technology. We are passionate about the Polkadot ecosystem and we are committed to building a strong and reliable infrastructure for the future of the Web3.
